nodes.text: Those creatures are the only thing that are stopping Vault City from making us their so-called  servants.
You believed them at face value?  You've a lot to learn about the world, friend.
With these, we'll be able to make something of this place over the next months. If you ever need a place to rest, you will always be welcome here.
They'll come for us if you do that, you know.
Greetings! The village has expanded again as we have hoped. You are welcome as always.
Hello again! Things have been going well, as you can see. Look around if you have the time.
Welcome back. Things are going well. We're going to work on expanding the Village.
We need three rifles and a shotgun. The sooner you can get them to us, the better.
Well, we can't let you do that.
You idiot! Why the hell did you do that!
I bet those bastards at Vault City sent you. Well you best be off, and leave everything else  alive.
Just don't kill anything out there, you simpleton.
Hey you! What are you doing!
We have nothing to fear from Vault City any longer, and will be able to live here in peace. Thank you again, wanderer.
Well I hope you choke on it. They'll be here for us soon.
The Vault City boys aren't the bravest. You show them any kind of a fight and they run for the hills. If we had a few guns, I think we could hold them off.
Well, I'm good with a shotgun, and we have some people in here that can handle a rifle. I think  three of those would do.
Stay where you are for now, wanderer. What are you doing here?
We're still building. We're hoping to expand the walls again in the next month.
You're not wanted here. Leave now.
You're back! Do you have the guns for us?

links.text: They're paying me to get rid of them, and the job's done.
They didn't tell me that.
Well they're paying me to get rid of the monsters, and that's what I'm going to do.
Is there anything I could do to help?
You're welcome.
Not my problem.
Okay.
You gotta do what you gotta do.
I needed the money.
Why?
Well, it's a little late for that.
I didn't know this was why they wanted the job done.
Yeah, well, I don't deal with trash like you anyway.
What sort of guns?
I'll see what I can do.
I'm killing off the monsters here.
Why, what's it to you?
Why you Yell!
Yeah, well, you're not going to be here for long anyway.
I changed my mind. What can I do to help?
What was it that you needed again?
Yep, here they are.
